backend/main.mo: Defines data models and state for creative profiles, projects, ratings, and collaboration spaces, with authorization checks and CRUD methods like saving/updating profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, pages, hooks, and layout behavior for reference.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark mode, defining colors, borders, and layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React root element and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router, root authentication flow, and route definitions for all app pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Protects authenticated routes by enforcing login and redirecting new users to onboarding while handling profile loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a sign-in/sign-out button using Internet Identity with error handling and React Query cache management.
frontend/src/components/collaboration/Me: Displays a project message board with live loading, message submission, scrolling, and manual refresh controls.
frontend/src/components/collaboration/Ta: Displays and manages a task list for a project, allowing adding tasks and refreshing the list.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with navigation, header, footer, and a container for page content.
frontend/src/components/matching/MatchCa: Shows a match candidate's info with shared tags and buttons to like or pass.
frontend/src/components/matching/SwipeDe: Cycles through match candidates one at a time and records like/pass decisions.
frontend/src/components/profile/Creative: Form for editing a creative profile, including bio, skills, availability, and portfolio links.
Displays a creative profile with bio, skills, links, and averaged collaboration ratings.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Form for creating a new project with title, description, genres, vibes, and goals.
frontend/src/components/system/AccessDen: Shows an access denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/system/LoadingSt: Provides loading, empty, and error UI states for various screens.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login/logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for profiles, projects, and mutations such as saving profiles or creating projects.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuizAnswers.ts: Stores and syncs quiz answers to localStorage and provides completeness checking and reset functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useSmartMatching.ts: Generates ranked match candidates from projects based on quiz answers and tracks like/pass decisions in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CollaborationSpacePag: Displays a projectâ€™s collaboration space with task and message boards, restricting access to the project owner.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows user dashboard with profile info, smart matches, project stats, and alerts for incomplete quiz setup.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with hero text, feature highlights, and login buttons.
frontend/src/pages/MatchesPage.tsx: Shows smart match recommendations after quiz completion, with swipe UI and fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingProfileSetu: Initial profile setup form capturing name and bio, then saving the profile and redirecting to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile with loading and error states, allowing the owner to edit their information.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed project info, genres, goals, and roles, with project completion actions for the owner.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Lists all projects with search and filtering, plus a dialog to create new projects.
frontend/src/pages/QuizPage.tsx: Multi-step quiz for selecting skill level, genres, goals, vibes, and inspirations, storing answers for matching.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders a settings page displaying quiz completion status and a button linking to the quiz. Uses UI components, hooks, and badges to show and update quiz answers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted or hash-based parameters. Includes utilities to clear parameters from session or URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, animations, fonts, and container settings. Loads typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project metadata, features, requirements, and image needs for the CollabForge app. Tracks project state version and architectural notes.
